content: this **pumpkin spice moss stitch scarf** is a quick and easy crochet scarf pattern for teen girls and women the best features of this scarf pattern are it s completely **reversible** works up with **3 skeins** of any aran weight yarn uses the **moss stitch** and **puff** stitch braids *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 6 5-mm k/10 5 us 3 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used the following yarns **a** king cole big value aran *257 yds / 235 m per 100 g* honeysuckle 3290 *1 skein* **b** stylecraft special aran *214 yds / 196 m per 100 g* copper 1029 *1 skein* **c** paintbox yarns simply aran *201 yds / 184 m per 100 g* slate green 226 *1 skein* feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 77 2 196 cm by 8 5 21 5 cm **gauge** 15 5 sts for 13 5 row in 4 10 cm working in the moss st **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
